last_episode_to_air.name: Jennifer Gomez
last_episode_to_air.overview: The well-educated daughter of doctors, Jennifer Gomez's love of bad boys and years of lying, drug addiction and burglarizing homes across Florida leads her to a 10-year prison sentence.

name: My True Crime Story
overview: Rapper and host Remy Ma profiles ordinary people who reveal how they got mixed up in criminal acts, from bank robberies to jewelry heists, and share their road to redemption in this true crime series.
tagline: Get the rise, fall, and redemption from the masterminds themselves.

episodes.name: Shawana King
episodes.overview: Shawana "Swipe Queen" King describes her multi-million dollar credit card fraud scam and how she's now using her hard-learned lessons to help black women start their own businesses.

episodes.name: Candice Martinez
episodes.overview: Candice Martinez escaped a difficult childhood in Santa Fe for the peaceful suburbs of Northern Virginia where she met the man of her dreams. But when the two get to robbing banks, their love story turns into a real-life Bonnie & Clyde.

episodes.name: Vincent Serrano
episodes.overview: Vincent Serrano started selling drugs to make child support payments and survive, but after getting busted, he learned how the justice system keeps people from improving themselves.

episodes.name: Jamila Davis
episodes.overview: Known as "Queensâ€™ Realest Agent", 21-year-old real estate agent Jamila Davis is flipping mansions for millions in exclusive neighborhoods. She had a wildly successful career, but her life turned into a legal nightmare after she became involved in a multimillion-dollar mortgage fraud scheme.

episodes.name: Garrain Jones
episodes.overview: Garrain Jones was living it up as an in-demand male model, but his life took a disastrous turn when he started chasing bigger paydays as an international drug trafficker.

episodes.name: Jodi Mattinson
episodes.overview: Jodi Mattison shakes off the restraints of her strict upbringing in a Mormon family and left behind her abusive ex-husband to create Salt Lake City's most successful escort empire, but the law never got off her tail until they put her behind bars.

episodes.name: Victor Lupis
episodes.overview: Victor Lupis, a rebellious underdog from Long Island who grew up in poverty and violence, tried to outrun a traumatic childhood by snatching diamonds from jewelry stores after he joins a notorious diamond crew. He runs away with a fortune but the money couldn't save him from the pain of a substance use disorder and he is unaware the police are hot on his heels.

episodes.name: Briana Rios
episodes.overview: Pregnant teenager Briana Rios sought to support her family with a $9-an-hour job at a dollar store only to find out that it's a front for an offshore gambling ring. She quickly becomes one of Miami's top illegal bookies until it all comes crashing down and her bosses try to pin all their crimes on her.

episodes.name: Aethena Striplin
episodes.overview: Bronx native Aethena Striplin dreams of being an entrepreneur like her beloved grandma, but the allure of fast money and the trappings of the justice system lead her down a traumatic path.

episodes.name: Lacola Nickens
episodes.overview: Desperate to support her family, single mother of four Lacola Nickens turns to making money as a Dominatrix.

episodes.name: Aron Gadson
episodes.overview: Teenager Aron Gadson was a certifiable Kingpin on the streets of Harlem raking in millions of dollars by his 18th birthday; his plan was to retire by age 25... until a personal weakness brought Aron in his early retirement to a surprising end.

episodes.name: Melissa Sclafani
episodes.overview: Melissa Sclafani, a new mother struggling with mounting bills and postpartum depression, stumbles upon the opportunity of a lifetime, taking her from local bank teller to one of the leaders of a worldwide steroid ring in a matter of months.

episodes.name: Dartanyon Williams
episodes.overview: Dartanyon Williams's ring of identity thieves made him a millionaire by age 19, but after his empire was brought down by the feds, his supportive family helped him get on a new path.

episodes.name: Coss Marte
episodes.overview: Coss Marte's desire for a better life and quick cash led to him becoming one of New York's most successful drug dealers, but his business's growth made it impossible to stay under the radar.

episodes.name: Steven Dominguez
episodes.overview: Steven Dominguez vows to escape generational poverty with a secure job as a Rikers Island prison guard, but greed gets the best of him when an inmate offers him a lucrative side hustle.

episodes.name: Matthew Cox
episodes.overview: Determined to overcome his dyslexia and earn his dad's approval, Matthew Cox uses his natural charm to evade the law as he scores millions in a complex array of financial scams.

episodes.name: Shannon Balenciaga
episodes.overview: As Shannon Balenciaga tries to overcome a traumatic childhood, she finds herself caught up in a series of fraud schemes that lead to a glamorous life -- and the attention of the feds.

episodes.name: Takasha Stevenson
episodes.overview: When her drug dealer boyfriend is sent to prison, Alabama single mom Takasha Stevenson learns from his mistakes as she takes his drug empire to the next level.

episodes.name: Joeisha JoJo Jefferson
episodes.overview: Joeisha "JoJo" Jefferson goes from boosting cars and robbing homes in L.A. to trafficking oxycodone and cocaine across the U.S. for $300,000 a week -- until a wake-up call changes her path.

episodes.name: Aisha Hall
episodes.overview: After trying to leave the world of drug dealing, Aisha Hall creates a well-oiled bank fraud scheme that continues to level up until a 10-year prison sentence puts a pause on her hustle.

episodes.name: William Cruz
episodes.overview: William Cruz's NYC chop shop surges into an international multimillion-dollar empire until a high-speed chase with Homeland Security sends him to prison and he turns his life around.

episodes.name: Anh Thu Nguyen
episodes.overview: Anh Thu Nguyen descends into the dark web and emerges as the head of a Seattle-based identity theft ring, losing herself to addiction before finding purpose in her son until the FBI moves in.

episodes.name: Allen Lindsey
episodes.overview: After surviving an abusive childhood, aspiring Hollywood actor Allen Lindsey follows his dreams and flees to the West Coast, where he becomes the King of Sherm, earning over $200,000 a week.

episodes.name: Leslie "Lady" Ray
episodes.overview: Leslie "Lady" Ray loves the finer things in life, and she hustles her way up through the Myrtle Beach, SC, nightlife scene as a nightclub owner and operator of an ecstasy and weed empire.

episodes.name: Darrell Alston
episodes.overview: Philly born rapper and athlete, Darrell Alston abandons his family values, and dares for a dose of street cred by selling cocaine, making $50,000 a month. When he's sent to prison, he turns his home bread hustle into a successful sneaker brand.

episodes.name: Yonus Davis
episodes.overview: When Oakland, CA, native Yonus Davis touches down in Canada to play for the CFL, he morphs into an international molly kingpin, moving ecstasy across the border and raking in the cash.

episodes.name: Dusty Trammell
episodes.overview: After years as a small-time crook, Dusty Trammell makes it her goal to join the Irish mob as a "Lady Clover," and she pays her dues to the gang by delivering drugs, smuggling cars and worse.

episodes.name: Richard Rodriguez
episodes.overview: A natural entrepreneur and hungry for money, Richard Rodriguez created one of the most successful steroid rings ever, earning him the nickname "The Pablo Escobar of Steroids."

episodes.name: Jennifer Gomez
episodes.overview: The well-educated daughter of doctors, Jennifer Gomez's love of bad boys and years of lying, drug addiction and burglarizing homes across Florida leads her to a 10-year prison sentence.
